alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Campbell; Kenton; Mason; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:58AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN MASON, ROBERTSON, NORTHERN KENTON, BRACKEN, CAMPBELL, EASTERN PENDLETON, EASTERN HAMILTON, CLERMONT, WESTERN BROWN AND SOUTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM EDT... At 258 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located from Cincinnati to near Claryville to 6 miles southeast of Falmouth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Covington, Norwood, Fort Thomas, Newport, Sharonville, Blue Ash, Loveland, Reading, Montgomery, North College Hill, Maysville, Madeira, Alexandria, Wyoming, Highland Heights, Milford, Taylor Mill, Bellevue and Deer Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 18. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Bracken; Campbell; Kenton; Mason; Pendleton; Robertson
